Class SQLXMLImpl.XMLCopier.Transcoding

java.lang.Object
org.postgresql.pljava.jdbc.SQLXMLImpl.XMLCopier
org.postgresql.pljava.jdbc.SQLXMLImpl.XMLCopier.Stream
org.postgresql.pljava.jdbc.SQLXMLImpl.XMLCopier.Direct
org.postgresql.pljava.jdbc.SQLXMLImpl.XMLCopier.Transcoding
Enclosing class:
SQLXMLImpl.XMLCopier
static class SQLXMLImpl.XMLCopier.Transcoding extends SQLXMLImpl.XMLCopier.Direct
Copier usable when source charset is contained in the target charset.

Charset containment doesn't guarantee encoding equivalence, so the stream may have to be transcoded, but there won't be any characters unrepresentable in the target encoding that need to be escaped. If the source presented a character stream, it is handled just as for Direct; if a binary stream, it is wrapped as a character stream and then handled the same way.
